Dear Cantera Users,
I am trying to find the equilibrium composition of the =
downstream 
coming from an autothermal reforming reactor of propane and n-b=
utane. 
I have decided to modify the GRI30.cti file according to my needs. =

the effluent stream contains mainly H2O, H2, CH4, CO, CO2. Neither 
propan=
e nor butane is present due to 100% conversion or combustion. 
Now I have 2=
 problems which I cannot overcome. If anyone can help me 
I would be thankf=
ul.
1) the most important one - I guess- I have to add reactions to 
GRI30.=
 In my system I have 9 reactions.

nnot understand what are the 
numbers in the barckets and what are their un=
its like

reaction( "H + CH4 <=3D> CH3 + H2",   [6.60000E+0=

eactions.
